name: Gone Phishing (Lynsay Shepherd)
description:
Client and Supervisor: Dr Lynsay Shepherd.

Module Leaders and Additional Supervisors: Mr Martin Lynagh, Ms Robin Griffiths, Dr Christos Michalakos.

Gone Phishing was developed by Play Now Games as part of the Professional Project module at Abertay University in 2022. They are an interdisciplinary team drawn from the Division of Games and Arts, and the Division of Games Technology and Mathematics. Team members: Calum Findleton (Producer/Designer), Jordan Hughes (Game Designer), Matt Ledger (Head 2D Artist), Bruce Scott (2D Artist), Michael Dunnion (3D Artist), Ella Threlfall (Programmer), Avery Black (Programmer), Gabriel Rodrigues (Programmer).
